subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The former Detroit Red Wings center Igor Larionov and the ex-Edmonton Oilers star Glenn Anderson have been elected to the Hall of Fame. The former linesman Ray Scapinello and Ed Chynoweth, a longtime president of the Western Hockey League and a founder of the Canadian Hockey League, also made the Hall. The induction ceremony will be held Nov. 10.
